thread.section_title: pentahotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel
thread.title_full: Good hotel - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Julie D
title: Good hotel
text: The hotel was good. Good location. Staff very friendly. The breckfast was fantastic. Dinners not so nice. Room was far to hot and AC was broken. The room was a very good size and was very clean. The beds were comfortable and there was no noise from other guests so I assume it was down to great insulation as opposed to quiet guests.
